attributes.action: recind the negative housing subsidy imposed on efficiently run housing departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NHS is an unfair tax on council tenents in one area to subsidise council tenents in another. It reduces the working capitol available for housing and ultimately brings paying councils into deficit to the detriment of tenents and the housing stock in negative subsidised areas. We further call upon the PM to require local authorities to resume the building of ECO standard social housing to meet local requirements.
